dcterms:description: The IEEE RTS-GMLC test case is a synthetic test system used for evaluating power system optimization models, particularly in the context of wildﬁre risk mitigation and power shutoff strategies.
dcterms:title: IEEE RTS-GMLC test case

dcterms:description: The Wildland Fire Potential Index (WFPI) provides wildﬁre risk data for the contiguous United States, released daily and includes current data along with 7-day forecasts.
dcterms:title: Wildland Fire Potential Index (WFPI)

dcterms:creator: S. Taylor
L. A. Roald
dcterms:description: Wildfire risk data from the United States Geological Survey (USGS) is used to assess and optimize line upgrades to mitigate wildfire risk.
dcterms:title: Wildfire risk data from the United States Geological Survey (USGS)
